headline: PPL Corporation Announces 2025 Virtual Annual Meeting
summary: PPL Corporation (NYSE: PPL) announced today that the company's 2025 Annual Meeting of Shareowners will be held virtually. The Annual Meeting will convene live via the internet on Friday, May 16, 2025, at 9 a.m. Eastern time.
